panels.description: Maximum number of parts per partition over the specified period of time.
panels.title: Max Parts Per Partition

panels.description: Percentage of the failed SELECTs over the specified period of time.
panels.title: Percent of Failed SELECTs

panels.description: Percentage of the failed INSERTs over the specified period of time (both synchronous and asynchronous).
panels.title: Percent of Failed INSERTs

panels.description: Number of log message with ERROR (and higher) severity over the specified period of time.asynchronous).
panels.title: logged errors

panels.description: Shows the total queries per second executed by all ClickHouse pods
panels.title: ClickHouse Cluster Query Rate

panels.description: Number of times when memory limit exceeded for query.
panels.title: Queries with MEMORY_LIMIT_EXCEEDED

panels.description: Same as Queries, but only for SELECT queries.
panels.title: SELECT Queries

panels.description: Same as Failed Queries, but only for SELECT queries.
panels.title: Failed SELECT Queries

panels.description: Same as Queries, but only for INSERT queries. Only accounts for synchronous inserts.
panels.title: Synchronous INSERT Queries

panels.description: Same as Queries, but only for INSERT queries. Only accounts for asynchronous inserts.
panels.title: Asynchronous INSERT Queries

panels.description: Same as Failed Queries, but only for INSERT queries. Only accounts for asynchronous inserts.
panels.title: Failed Asynchronous INSERT Queries
